definition: to look over/to examine/to check up/to ferret out
see 山查[shan1 zha1]
surname Zha
to research/to check/to investigate/to examine/to refer to/to look up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)
to look after/to take care of/to watch/to guard
to see/to look at/to read/to watch/to visit/to call on/to consider/to regard as/to look after/to treat (an illness)/to depend on/to feel (that)/(after verb) to give it a try/Watch out! (for a danger)

sentences.english: When you share a page, you can designate users as viewers or editors.
sentences.chinese: 在共享頁面時，您可以將用戶指定爲查看者或編輯者。

sentences.english: Just look at the swollen side profile of the brooding pouch!
sentences.chinese: 請查看這腫脹孵卵袋的側貌。

sentences.english: Sterile, crystal clear tips let you see transparent samples.
sentences.chinese: 完全透明的消毒吸頭可查看透明的樣本。

sentences.english: Cattle in North Korea being checked for signs of FMD.
sentences.chinese: 正在查看朝鮮的牛是否有口蹄疫症狀。

sentences.english: On the day succeeding the fire, I visited the ruins.
sentences.chinese: 失火的第二天，我去查看那堆廢墟。

sentences.english: If you always forget what the heck IIRC stands for, here's where to look.
sentences.chinese: 如果你總是忘記那鬼IIRC代表什麼，去這裏查看。

sentences.english: View this list of parenting groups in San Mateo County and the Greater Bay Area.
sentences.chinese: 查看聖馬刁縣及灣區親子團的資料。

sentences.english: The border styles make it easy to see the results of the tournament.
sentences.chinese: 邊界樣式的使用使查看錦標賽的結果非常容易。

sentences.english: See that all the door is locked before you leave.
sentences.chinese: 你一定要查看一下門都鎖好再走。

sentences.english: However, Rock Financial Showplace might also prove to be too small for the international show.
sentences.chinese: 然而，巖財務展示也可能被證明是太小，國際查看。

sentences.english: Double-click the icon to view the contents of the disc.
sentences.chinese: 雙擊該圖標來查看光盤內容。

sentences.english: I also invite several upfitter to look through my new apartment tonight.
sentences.chinese: 今晚，我還請了幾個裝修工去查看我了新房子。

sentences.english: What if you want to see only the illiteracy rate in Europe?
sentences.chinese: 那麼如果只想查看歐洲的文盲率呢？

sentences.english: Try reloading your page and checking it out.
sentences.chinese: 請您也嘗試重新加載您的頁面並查看結果。

sentences.english: On his way to the harvest supper Gabriel stopped to check the eight huge hay-and wheat-ricks.
sentences.chinese: 蓋伯瑞爾走在路上，停下來查看那八個麥垛。

sentences.english: These restaurant recommendations can be viewed by other friends of yours.
sentences.chinese: 這些餐館推薦可以供您的其他朋友查看。

definition: to check/to inquire/to consult (a document etc)/inquiry/query
to search for/to look up
to consult/to refer to/to look sth up in a reference source
to scan
to search (a place)/to search (a database etc)
details/particulars
to inquire
to hit/to press/to strike (on the keyboard)/to click (a web page button)
to be mindful/to pay attention to/to take note of
to check/to verify/to audit/to examine
to import/to input
to reply/to recover/to return (to a previous condition)/Re: in reply to (email)
to confirm/to verify/confirmation
see 山查[shan1 zha1]
surname Zha
to research/to check/to investigate/to examine/to refer to/to look up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)
fence/railing/hurdle/column or box (of text or other data)
inspection/to examine/to inspect/CL:次[ci4]
